name: Death Drive (Oliver Gallina)
description:
DEATH DRIVE is a punishing 2D action platforming game about fighting off legions of demons and crazed apocalypse survivors in order to climb to the top of The Spire, a perilous, mysterious tower.

Shove foes and obstacles out of your way, dodge flamethrowers and fireballs, and ascend to the top of each section of the tower before a gurgling pool of lava engulfs you. 

Along the way discover Codex entries which detail the game's world and characters, and try to piece together just what in heck is going on around here. 

DEATH DRIVE is PROUDLY brought to you by Rose Gold Media, a student team at the University of Utah.

FEATURES:

- 3 punishing, death-packed levels

- Unique vertically scrolling platforming & baddie-shoving gameplay

- Really really good pixel art, including different locales in each level

- Really really good sounds and music

- A really really good narrative and LORE

- A TANTALIZINGLY MYSTERIOUS SECRET WHICH LIES AT THE TOP OF THE SPIRE
